title: Chat Settings
body: How do i enable chatting with all players during game.. all players including opposition. I click preferences and there is no option to enable it?

replies.body:
You can find the option to enable this in-game under the **Interface** options under the subsection of **Chat**. It's listed as **'Show [All] Chat (Matched Games)'**. Be sure you hit *'okay'* after you make the change.

Let me know if this resolved it for you.
